name: Horizon Of History
description: Horizon of History is an educational VR experience that will take you on a journey through the ages. It's a virtual time machine that will teleport you between key periods of the history of Poland's capital city - Warsaw.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 3 GB available space
